title: Service Quality Practical Competency Enhancement: Mathematics-Based Decision-Making Education for Corporate Managerial Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistics and arithmetic computation skills
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Students can propose at least two optimization strategies for business processes using mathematical modeling techniques.
Students can establish resource allocation plans and utilize statistical analysis results for decision-making.
Students can collaboratively derive data-driven problem-solving strategies with team members by analyzing real-world corporate cases.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
